message: Monday, February 20, 2023 at 07:47AM - We were discussing solutions to reduce suffering and poverty. We discussed initiatives such as providing access to basic services, creating job opportunities, investing in infrastructure, reducing inequality, and promoting social justice. We also discussed providing access to healthcare and mental health services, investing in renewable energy sources, investing in sustainable agriculture and food security initiatives, and investing in social protection programs. Do you think there are any other solutions to reduce suffering and poverty?
speaker: RAVEN
